Hey guys, if you're having trouble opening up the VMWare Workstation installation thingy, and it only shows a blank window, follow this link to fix the problem:
http://kb.vmware.com/selfservice/microsites/search.do?language=en_US&cmd=displayKC&externalId=1027986

Worked for me :)

Installing the game:
1) Install VMware Workstation v8.0.1 Full;
2) Exract the RAR file in CS folder, thr u ll find CSGOBeta.ovf file
3) Run VMware, in the "File" menu - "Open" to select "Open image format for virtual machines" and import the folder Image  CSGOBeta.ovf.
4) Start the game with a shortcut on the desktop virtual machine.
